title: Default Time Value
description: Default value for time field when no value is provided. Can be an ISO 8601 time string (HH:mm:ss or HH:mm:ss.sss) or a special keyword like 'now'. Applied automatically when creating new records. Useful for appointment slots, business hours, recurring schedules.

specs.title: Apply static default time
specs.given: a time field with default value '09:00:00'
specs.when: user creates a record without providing a time value

specs.title: Apply dynamic 'now' default
specs.given: a time field with default value 'now'
specs.when: user creates a record at 15:30:45 without providing a time value
specs.then: the field is populated with the current time (e.g., '15:30:45')

specs.title: User value overrides default
specs.given: a time field with default value '09:00:00'
specs.when: user creates a record and provides time value '14:30:00'
specs.then: the field is populated with user-provided value '14:30:00' (default ignored)

specs.title: Reject invalid default time format
specs.when: user sets default to '2:30 PM' (invalid format)
specs.then: validation error is returned with message 'Default must be ISO 8601 time (HH:mm:ss) or keyword (now)'
